friendly_competition.description: You revel in the community spirit of a competition, and inspire others to follow suit. Whenever you finish repairing a generator with at least one other Survivor, this perk activates. You and other survivors who finished repairing the generator with you get {0}% increased repair progress speed for {1} seconds. Survivors can only have one instance of this perk's ability active at once.

teamwork_power_of_two.name: Teamwork: Power Of Two
teamwork_power_of_two.description: It’s hard to keep up with you, but it doesn’t stop people from trying. When you finish healing another Survivor, you both gain {0}% Haste as long as you stay within {1} meters of each other. This effect lingers for 4 seconds when leaving the range. This effect does not stack. Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

background_player.name: Background Player
background_player.description: You're not usually the center of attention. In some cases, this can be a good thing. When the Killer picks-up another Survivor, Background Player activates for {0} seconds. When you start running, break into a sprint at {1}% of your normal Running Movement speed for {2} seconds. This perk cannot be used while Exhausted . This perk causes the Exhausted status effect for {3} seconds. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

blood_rush.name: Blood Rush
blood_rush.description: Your mind and body are honed for great feats, allowing you to push through with extra effort when necessary. After being unhooked, Blood Rush activates for the next {0} seconds. While suffering from the Exhausted status effect, press the Active Ability Button 1 to recover from Exhausted instantly. This perk deactivates when it is used or when performing a Conspicuous Action. Blood Rush is disabled once the Exit Gates are powered. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

teamwork_collective_stealth.name: Teamwork: Collective Stealth
teamwork_collective_stealth.description: When someone helps you out, you respond in kind. When another Survivor finishes healing you, you both leave no scratch marks as long as you stay within {1} meters of each other. This effect lingers for 4 seconds when leaving the range. This effect does not stack.

troubleshooter.name: Troubleshooter
troubleshooter.description: No amount of distraction will shake you from your primary task. When you are chased by the Killer, Troubleshooter activates. You see the aura of the Generator with the most progress. You see the aura of the Killer for {0} seconds after dropping a Pallet. The effect lasts for {1} seconds after being in chase, then deactivates.

made_for_this.name: Made For This
made_for_this.description: You were born to survive, and raised to adapt. Made for This activates while you are in the injured state. After you finish healing another Survivor, gain the Endurance status effect for {1} seconds. While affected by Deep Wound , you run {0}% faster. Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead. Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description: Where others see junk, you see valuable improvised tools. While you are holding an empty toolbox, Scavenger activates. Succeeding a great skill check while repairing gains {0} token, up to {1}. When you reach maximum tokens, lose all tokens and automatically recharge your toolbox to full. Then, your generator repair speed is {2}% slower for {3} seconds. This perk grants the ability to rummage through an opened chest once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Toolbox.

dramaturgy.name: Dramaturgy
dramaturgy.description: When people bring you on to their project, they do so because of the unexpected magic you bring to your performance. Dramaturgy activates while you are healthy. While running, press the active ability button 2 to run with knees high for 0.5 seconds and then gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds, followed by an unknown effect. Become Exposed for {2} seconds; Gain {3}% Haste for {4} seconds; Scream, but nothing happens; Gain a random rare item, with random add-ons, and drop any held item. The same effect cannot happen twice in a row. Dramaturgy causes Exhausted for {5} seconds. Can't be used while Exhausted . Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured. Haste increases Survivor movement speed. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating other perks that cause Exhausted.

scene_partner.name: Scene Partner
scene_partner.description: You lock in with your co-star, engaging with and reacting to each other on a higher level. Scene Partner activates when you are in the Killer's Terror Radius. Whenever you look at the Killer, scream, then see the Killer's aura for {0} seconds. There is a chance you will scream again, if you do, you will see the Killer's aura for an additional 2 seconds. Scene Partner then goes on cooldown for {1} seconds.

plot_twist.name: Plot Twist
plot_twist.description: Big moments are vital, but you know that sometimes an understated read can be just as powerful. Plot Twist activates when you are injured. Press the ability button 2 while crouched and motionless to enter the dying state silently. When using Plot Twist to enter the dying state: you leave no blood pools and you make no noise and you can fully recover from the dying state. When you recover by yourself using Plot Twist , you are healed instantly and you gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds. This perk deactivates if you recover by yourself by any means. This perk re-activates when the exit gates are powered. Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

lucky_star.name: Lucky Star
lucky_star.description: You know how to stay calm in the face of incomprehensible danger. When you hide in a locker, you make no grunts of pain. After exiting the locker, you see the aura of the closest generator and all Survivors, leave no pools of blood and make no grunts of pain for {0} seconds. This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds.

chemical_trap.name: Chemical Trap
chemical_trap.description: In the Fog, an officer must adapt to the materials at hand. Chemical Trap activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of progress on generators. While standing next to a dropped pallet, press the Active Ability Button 2 to install a Trap, which stays active for {1} seconds. Affected pallets will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Chemical trap can be active on a pallet. When the Killer performs the break action on the pallet, the Chemical trap explodes, and they are slowed by {2}% for {3} seconds.

light-footed.name: Light-footed
light-footed.description: Crossing paths with deadly killers has taught you the value of discretion. When you are healthy, this perk activates. Your running footsteps are silent. This perk goes on cooldown for {0} seconds after performing a rushed action.

champion_of_light.name: Champion Of Light
champion_of_light.description: The glow of the flashlight looks a little different, feels a little warmer. When you are shining a Flashlight, you have {0}% Haste . When you successfully blind the Killer, they also gain {1}% Hindered for {2} seconds. This effect cannot stack with itself. Then, this perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds. Haste increases Survivor movement speed. Hindered reduces Killer movement speed.

boon_illumination.name: Boon: Illumination
boon_illumination.description: Your keen insight is something best shared with others. Press and hold the Ability Button 1 near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range. Survivors inside your Boon Totem’s range see the aura of all chests and all generators in blue. If you have a lit Boon Totem, you cleanse or bless Totems {1}% faster. You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped Boon perks are active on your Boon Totem. "A shift in reality. Heavy with hidden meanings" – Return

deadline.name: Deadline
deadline.description: Desperation creeps in, and you push yourself to work harder. This perk activates when you are injured. Skill Checks appear {0}% more frequently when repairing or healing and appear in random places. The penalty for missing skill checks is reduced by {1}%.

invocation_weaving_spiders.name: Invocation: Weaving Spiders
invocation_weaving_spiders.description: The place where fear festers and terror treads is also where those with the gift can reach across the veil. When in the basement near the circle, press the Ability Button 1 to begin the Invocation. Invocations take {0} seconds. Other Survivors will see your aura during this and can join an ongoing interaction. Once the Invocation is completed: You become Injured and gain the Broken status effect for the rest of the trial. Reduce the maximum required generator charges of all remaining generators by {1}. Completing the Invocation disables that perk for all Survivors. Broken prevents Survivors from being healed. "I call upon the spirits of the night, to aid us in our desperate flight!" - Sable

strength_in_shadows.name: Strength In Shadows
strength_in_shadows.description: A chance for renewed power down where danger calls home. When in the basement, this perk activates. Unlocks the Strength in Shadows ability, which allows you to heal without a Med-kit at {0}% normal healing speed. When you finish a heal in the basement, you see the Killer's aura for {1} seconds. "I’m getting out of here, if it’s the last thing I do.” - Sable

wicked.name: Wicked
wicked.description: They can try to hurt you. But you’re not going down so easily. Your self-unhook attempts in the basement always succeed. When you are unhooked or unhook yourself, you see the Killer's aura for {0} seconds.

mirrored_illusion.name: Mirrored Illusion
mirrored_illusion.description: A familiar spell made unfamiliar in this corrupted landscape. This perk activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of repairs on generators. Press the Ability button 2 when next to a generator, totem, chest or exit gate to spawn a static illusion that lasts for {1} seconds. Then, the perk deactivates. "Just... stay there... perfect!" - Baermar

bardic_inspiration.name: Bardic Inspiration
bardic_inspiration.description: It's time to give your audience a show. Will you bring the house down or will you choke? Press and hold the Ability button 1 while standing and motionless to enter the performance interaction that lasts up to {0} seconds and empowers Survivors within {1} meters. Roll a d20. This effect lasts for {2} seconds if the performance is completed. 1 | You scream, but nothing happens 2-10 | Skill Checks give +1% progress 11-19 | Skill Checks give +2% progress 20 | Skill Checks give +3% progress When the ability is canceled or the performance completes, it goes on cooldown for {3} seconds. "Listen closely! I'm about to save your life!" - Aestri

still_sight.name: Still Sight
still_sight.description: A clear mind and calm temperament will always find the means of their escape. After not moving for {0} seconds, this perk activates. Until you start moving, you see the aura of the Killer as well as all generators and chests within {1} meters. "Breathe in. Breathe out. Now open your eyes." - Baermar

finesse.name: Finesse
finesse.description: The threat of danger can motivate any creature to strengthen its resolve. This perk activates when you are healthy. Your fast vaults are {0}% faster. This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds after performing a fast vault. "Just need to push myself a bit further." - Lara Croft

hardened.name: Hardened
hardened.description: Live long enough, and survival will run in your blood. This perk activates after you complete all of the following: Unlock a chest; Cleanse or bless a totem. For the rest of the trial, anytime you would scream, reveal the Killer's aura for {0} seconds instead. "Got to keep quiet. That thing is still out there." - Lara Croft

specialist.name: Specialist
specialist.description: Adventure. Exploration. Excavation. You are in your element. Each time you open or rummage through a chest, gain 1 token , up to {0}. When you perform a great Skill Check on a generator, consume all tokens . Then, for each token consumed, reduce the maximum required generator progress by {1}. "Well, then. Doesn't this feel familiar?" - Lara Croft

eyes_of_belmont.name: Eyes Of Belmont
eyes_of_belmont.description: A history of vampire-hunting imbues the bloodline with certain abilities. When a generator is completed, the aura of the Killer is revealed to you for {0} seconds. Whenever a Killer's aura is revealed for a specified amount of time, that time is increased by {1} seconds. "Ha! Your secret has been revealed!" - Trevor

exultation.name: Exultation
exultation.description: Fortune favors the bold, even in the darkest corners of existence. Stunning the Killer with a pallet upgrades your held item rarity to the next tier, then recharges {0}% of the item's maximum charges. This perk has a {1}-second cooldown. "You will not take me this day!" - Trevor

moment_of_glory.name: Moment Of Glory
moment_of_glory.description: A hero should always have the chance to make a comeback. This perk activates after you open or rummage through {0} chests. When you become injured, you also become Broken . Automatically heal 1 health state after {1} seconds. Then, this perk deactivates. This effect is canceled if you enter the dying state. This perk will not activate if you are already suffering from the Broken status effect. Broken prevents Survivors from being healed. "Never lose hope for a brighter tomorrow." - Trevor

invocation_treacherous_crows.name: Invocation: Treacherous Crows
invocation_treacherous_crows.description: One with arcane knowledge has no reason to fear those watchful birds. When in the basement near the circle, press the Ability button 2 to begin the Invocation. Invocations take {0} seconds. Other Survivors will see your aura during this and can join an ongoing interaction. Once the Invocation is completed: You become injured and gain the Broken status effect for the rest of the trial. When a Survivor is in the Terror Radius and the Killer scares a crow, their aura is revealed to all Survivors for {1} seconds. Completing the Invocation disables that perk for all Survivors. Broken prevents Survivors from being healed. "Remember your training. They taught you all about the crows." - Taurie Cain

clean_break.name: Clean Break
clean_break.description: At the end of the day, everyone has to look out for themselves. After you finish healing another Survivor, while being healed by another Survivor, press the Ability button 1 to gain the Broken status effect. After {0} seconds, you become healthy. This perk does not activate if you are already Broken . The effect is canceled if you go into the dying state. Broken prevents Survivors from being healed. "I'll be fine! Don't stick your neck out for me." - Taurie Cain

shoulder_the_burden.name: Shoulder The Burden
shoulder_the_burden.description: Born to be a disciple. Ready to submit to a greater cause. This is your calling. Once per trial, as long as you are not on death hook, press the Ability button 2 in front of a hooked Survivor to unhook them. When they are unhooked, they lose 1 hook state and you gain 1 hook state. You also scream and gain the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds. Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured. "It's not your time yet. Now go on!" - Taurie Cain

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. See hook auras in a 56 meter radius from the pickup spot if another Survivor is being carried. Scourge Hooks are shown in yellow. Unlocks the ability to sabotage hooks without a Toolbox. Sabotaging a hook without a Toolbox takes 2.3 seconds. The sabotage action has a {0} second cooldown.

save_the_best_for_last.name: Save The Best For Last
save_the_best_for_last.description: You become obsessed with one Survivor. Earn a token for each successful basic attack that is not dealt to the Obsession. Each token grants a stackable {0}% decreased successful basic attack cooldown, you can earn up to {1} tokens. When you hit the Obsession with a Basic Attack or Special Attack, lose {2} tokens. You cannot gain tokens as long as your Obsession is sacrificed or killed. The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

second_wind.name: Second Wind
second_wind.description: When you have healed other Survivors for the equivalent of one health state, Second Wind activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Second Wind does not activate. While Second Wind is activated, the next time you are unhooked or you unhook yourself, you are affected by the Broken status effect. After a total duration of {0} seconds, Second Wind automatically heals you from injured to healthy. Second Wind deactivates once you become healthy or if you are put into the dying state before Second Wind successfully triggers. You lose the Broken status effect. Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.description: Past battles have taught you a thing or two about survival. Grants the ability to fully recover from the dying state once per trial . Increases dying recovery speed by {0}%.

self-care.name: Self-Care
self-care.description: Unlocks the Self Care ability, which allows you to heal without a Med-kit at {0}% normal healing speed.

shadowborn.name: Shadowborn
shadowborn.description: You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night. When blinded by any means, gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds. Haste increases Killer movement speed.

slippery_meat.name: Slippery Meat
slippery_meat.description: You have developed an efficient way to get off hooks. Grants up to {0} extra escape attempts on the hook. Hook escape attempts have a {1}% increased chance to succeed.

sloppy_butcher.name: Sloppy Butcher
sloppy_butcher.description: You know where to hit to make them bleed. Wounds inflicted by basic attacks cause Survivors to suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for {0} seconds. Increases the rate at which healing progression is lost from Hemorrhage by {1}%. Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed. Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

small_game.name: Small Game
small_game.description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45-degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Small Game has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates. For each Dull Totem and Hex Totem cleansed by any player, gain a Token. Small Game's detection cone is reduced by 5 degrees per token.

sole_survivor.name: Sole Survivor
sole_survivor.description: As more of your friends fall to the Killer, you become shrouded in isolation and the Killer's aura-reading abilities towards you are disrupted. Every time a fellow Survivor is killed or sacrificed, gain a token. For each token, your aura cannot be read by The Killer within a max range of {0} meters. When you're the last Survivor alive: Gain 75% action speed when repairing generators. Gain 50% action speed while opening an exit gate or the Hatch. Increases your chances of being The Killer's Obsession. The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

solidarity.name: Solidarity
solidarity.description: Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal. While injured, healing a Survivor without using a Med-kit also heals you at a {0}% conversion rate.

soul_guard.name: Soul Guard
soul_guard.description: You have been through immense hardship and you’re stronger for it. Gain the Endurance status effect for {0} seconds after being healed or having recovered from the dying state. While cursed by a Hex, you can fully recover from the dying state. This effect can only trigger once every 30 seconds. Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead. Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

spies_from_the_shadows.name: Spies From The Shadows
spies_from_the_shadows.description: The crows found in the world can communicate with you directly. {0}% of the time, cawing crows give you a visual cue when you are within a {1} meter range. Spies From The Shadows has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

spine_chill.name: Spine Chill
spine_chill.description: An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom. Get notified when the Killer is looking at you with a clear line of sight within a 36-meter range. Your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, cleansing, blessing, opening exit gates and unlocking is increased by {0}%. The effects of Spine Chill linger for 0.5 seconds after the Killer looks away or is out of range.

spirit_fury.name: Spirit Fury
spirit_fury.description: Each pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity. After you break {0} pallets, the next time you are stunned by a pallet, The Entity will instantly break the pallet. You still suffer from the stun effect penalty.

sprint_burst.name: Sprint Burst
sprint_burst.description: When starting to run, break into a sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for a maximum of {1} seconds. Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds. Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted . You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

stake_out.name: Stake Out
stake_out.description: Getting close to the Killer fills you with determination. For each {0} seconds you are standing within the Killer Terror Radius and not in a chase, you gain a token up to a maximum of {1} tokens. When Stake Out has at least 1 token , good Skill Checks are considered great Skill Checks, consume 1 token , and grant an additional 1% bonus to generator repair progress.

streetwise.name: Streetwise
streetwise.description: Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you've got. Reduce consumption rate of item charge by {0}% for you and allies within a {1} meter range. Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.

stridor.name: Stridor
stridor.description: You are acutely sensitive to the breathing of your prey. Breathing of Survivors in pain is {0}% louder and regular breathing is {1}% louder.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology. Putting a Survivor into the dying state with a basic attack causes all generators within a 32-meter radius to explode instantly and begin regressing. Generators affected by Surge immediately lose {0}% of their progress.

surveillance.name: Surveillance
surveillance.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any regressing generator will be highlighted by a white aura. If the regression is interrupted on a generator, it will be highlighted by a yellow aura for {0} seconds. Noises created by generator repairs are audible at an additional {1} meters.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision. The noises caused by your repairs and their hearing distance are reduced by {0} meters. On a failed repair Skill Check, the following effects happen: The generator explosion will be prevented. The generator loses progress as usual. An additional {1}% progress is lost.

tenacity.name: Tenacity
tenacity.description: There is nothing stopping you. Your ferocious tenacity in dire situations allows you to crawl {0}% faster and recover at the same time. Grunts of pain while in the dying state are reduced by 75%.

territorial_imperative.name: Territorial Imperative
territorial_imperative.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they enter the basement and you are more than {1} meters away from the basement entrance. Territorial Imperative can only be triggered once every {2} seconds.

thanatophobia.name: Thanatophobia
thanatophobia.description: Their courage fades in the face of undeniable mortality. For each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor, all Survivors receive a penalty of {0}% to repair, sabotage and Totem-cleansing speeds. If there are 4 injured, dying or hooked Survivors, there is an additional 12% penalty to repair, sabotage and Totem-cleansing speeds.

mettle_of_man.name: Mettle Of Man
mettle_of_man.description: Evil has a way of always finding you. After you earn {0} Protection Hit scoring events, Mettle of Man activates. Once activated, the next occasion that would put you into the dying state from the injured state is ignored. The next time you heal back to full health, your aura will be revealed to the Killer when you are further than {1} meters from the Killer. Mettle of Man will deactivate the next time you are put into the dying state. Increases your chances to be the Killer’s Obsession. The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

this_is_not_happening.name: This Is Not Happening
this_is_not_happening.description: You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress. Great Skill Check success zones when repairing and healing get {0}% bigger when you are injured.

thrilling_tremors.name: Thrilling Tremors
thrilling_tremors.description: Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity. After picking up a Survivor, all Generators not being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity and cannot be repaired for the next {0} seconds. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura. Thrilling Tremors can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.description: Whenever a generator is repaired to {0}% progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for the next {2} seconds. This effect can only be triggered once on each generator. Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

trail_of_torment.name: Trail Of Torment
trail_of_torment.description: You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment. After damaging a generator, you become Undetectable until the generator stops regressing. During this time, the generator’s yellow aura is revealed to Survivors. This effect can only trigger once every {2} seconds. Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

unnerving_presence.name: Unnerving Presence
unnerving_presence.description: Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% greater chance of triggering Skill Checks when repairing or healing. Triggered Skill Checks' success zones are reduced by {1}%.

unrelenting.name: Unrelenting
unrelenting.description: You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon. The cooldown after missed basic attacks is reduced by {0}%.

up_the_ante.name: Up The Ante
up_the_ante.description: All will be well in the end; you just know it. Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you. For each other Survivor still alive, grant a {0}% bonus of luck to all remaining Survivors.

urban_evasion.name: Urban Evasion
urban_evasion.description: Years of evading the cops taught you a thing or two about stealth. Your movement speed while crouching is increased by {0}%.

vigil.name: Vigil
vigil.description: You look over your friends even in dire situations. You and your allies within a {0} meter range recover from the Blindness, Broken, Exhausted, Exposed, Hemorrhage, Hindered, Mangled and Oblivious status effects {1}% faster. Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.

visionary.name: Visionary
visionary.description: You’re remarkably focused on your means of escape. You see generator’s auras within {0} meters. Anytime a generator is completed, Visionary is disabled for {1} seconds.

wake_up.name: Wake Up!
wake_up.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Once all generators are powered, exit gates are revealed to you within a {0} meter range. While opening the exit gates, reveal your aura to other Survivors up to {1} meters. While Wake Up! is active, you open the exit gates {2}% faster.

we_ll_make_it.name: We'll Make It
we_ll_make_it.description: Helping others heightens your morale. When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a {0}% speed increase while healing others for {1} seconds.

we_re_gonna_live_forever.name: We're Gonna Live Forever
we_re_gonna_live_forever.description: Your few friends deserve the best protection. When healing another Survivor in the dying state, your healing speed is increased by {0}%. Once healing is complete, the healed Survivor gains the Endurance status effect for {1} seconds. This effect has a {2}-second cooldown. Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead. Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

whispers.name: Whispers
whispers.description: You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice. Sporadically hear The Entity's whisper when standing within a {0} meter range of a Survivor.

windows_of_opportunity.name: Windows Of Opportunity
windows_of_opportunity.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Auras of pallets, breakable walls, and vault locations are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.

zanshin_tactics.name: Zanshin Tactics
zanshin_tactics.description: You are mentally alert and aware of nearby enemies in retreat. Reveal the aura of pallets and vaults within {0} meters. Survivors who drop pallets are revealed to you for {1} seconds.
